TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DictionaryKeyPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DictionaryKeyPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DictionaryKeyPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定相關聯類別的屬性，以提供隱含索引鍵值。

span.span: Specifies a property of the associated class that provides the implicit key value.

summary.span: 這些隱含索引鍵會作為索引鍵，而不是針對 集合中的項目在 XAML 中定義的明確 屬性。

span.span: Implicit keys are used for keys rather than explicit attributes defined in XAML for an item in collections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目字典 (例如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ) 需要索引鍵。Items in an dictionary (such as the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ) require a key. 在 XAML 中，指定的索引鍵是通常由`x:Key`屬性中的每個項目在 XAML 標記中。In XAML, the key is typically specified by `x:Key` attribute in the XAML markup for each item in the . 會套用至類別可搭配隱含索引鍵，其中的索引鍵用於包含來自不同的屬性值在類別中。The is applied to classes that work with an implicit key, where the key to use for inclusion comes from a different property value in the class. 執行個體的類別套用可以包含在沒有明確的索引鍵，只要所參考之屬性做為索引鍵，該字典實作中有效的值。Instances of the class applying the can be included in an without an explicit key so long as the property referenced by has a value that is valid as a key in that dictionary implementation. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes 下列清單會參考 WPF 應用程式開發介面在套用這個屬性的範例：The following list references examples of WPF APIs where this attribute is applied: - - - 如需有關 WPF 資源字典的含意，請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。For more information about the WPF resource dictionary implications of , see [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
